name: NSVisualEffectView.State
desc: Constants to specify how the material appearance should reflect window activity state.

items.name: case followsWindowActiveState
items.desc: The backdrop should automatically appear active when the window is active, and inactive when it is not.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The backdrop should always appear active.

items.name: case inactive
items.desc: The backdrop should always appear inactive.
